name: Club
description: A simple blunt weapon made of wood.

name: Dagger
description: A small, sharp-bladed weapon usable for stabbing or throwing.

name: Greatclub
description: A large, heavy club requiring two hands.

name: Handaxe
description: A small, light axe usable for melee or throwing.

name: Javelin
description: A light spear designed for throwing.

name: Light Hammer
description: A small, balanced hammer that can be thrown.

name: Mace
description: A heavy-headed weapon designed to crush armor.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A long wooden staff, often wielded two-handed.

name: Sickle
description: A curved blade useful for cutting and slashing.

name: Spear
description: A versatile piercing weapon, can be thrown or used in melee.

name: Light Crossbow
description: A simple crossbow requiring two hands to operate.

name: Dart
description: A small, lightweight throwing projectile.

name: Shortbow
description: A small bow suited for quick shots at medium range.

name: Sling
description: A leather strap used to hurl small stones or bullets.

name: Battleaxe
description: A heavy, versatile axe usable one- or two-handed.

name: Flail
description: A spiked striking head attached to a handle by a chain.

name: Glaive
description: A polearm with a large curved blade on the end.

name: Greataxe
description: A massive two-handed axe designed for heavy strikes.

name: Greatsword
description: A huge two-handed sword with a broad blade.

name: Halberd
description: A polearm combining an axe blade and a spear point.

name: Lance
description: A long weapon for mounted combat, deals heavy piercing damage.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile sword usable one- or two-handed.

name: Maul
description: A giant, two-handed hammer delivering crushing blows.

name: Morningstar
description: A spiked metal head on a heavy shaft.

name: Pike
description: A long polearm for keeping enemies at a distance.

name: Rapier
description: A slender, sharp-pointed sword ideal for piercing attacks.

name: Scimitar
description: A curved sword suited for slashing attacks.

name: Shortsword
description: A light, quick piercing weapon favored by rogues.

name: Trident
description: A three-pronged spear usable for melee or throwing.

name: War Pick
description: A weapon with a sharp pick head designed to pierce armor.

name: Warhammer
description: A versatile hammer designed for crushing armor.

name: Whip
description: A long, flexible weapon that can strike at a distance.

name: Blowgun
description: A small tube used to shoot tiny poisoned darts.

name: Hand Crossbow
description: A small crossbow usable with one hand.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: A large, powerful crossbow requiring two hands.

name: Longbow
description: A large bow with great range and power.

name: Net
description: A thrown weapon used to entangle and restrain targets.

name: Boots
description: Protective footwear that covers the feet and lower legs, often enchanted for speed or stealth.

name: Pants/Greaves
description: Leg armor or tough pants; greaves are metal plates protecting the shins.

name: Ring
description: A small metal band worn on the finger, often enchanted with magical properties.

name: Amulet
description: A decorative or magical pendant worn around the neck.

name: Glove
description: Hand coverings that can be armored or enchanted for grip, strength, or dexterity.

name: Shirt/Chest Piece
description: Protective upper body clothing or armor that shields the chest and torso.

name: Hat/Helmet
description: Headwear providing protection; helmets are armored, hats can be enchanted or ceremonial.

name: Armor
description: A full suit of armor providing protection from enemy attacks. Includes all pieces of armor and provides AC reduction.
